metadataAttributes.Title: Bioinformatics Specialization
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Journey to the Frontier of Computational Biology. Master bioinformatics software and computational approaches in modern biology.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Whole Genome Sequencing, Viterbi Algorithm, Suffix Tree, Python Programming, Algorithms, Unweighted Pair Group Method with Arithmetic Mean (UPGMA), Bioinformatics, Bioinformatics Algorithms, Dynamic Programming, Graph Theory,
